:memo: Create and **merge** a branch <br>

1. Create a new branch called feature. <br>
1. Switch to your new branch. <br>
1. Add a new recipe to your recipe text file. <br>
1. Switch back to your main branch <br>
1. Merge this branch with your main branch and delete the feature branch afterwards. <br>

:memo: Create and resolve a  **merge conflict**  <br>

1. Create a new branch called feature. <br>
1. Add text to your recipe file on your main branch <br>
1. Switch to your new feature branch. <br>
1. Add text to your recipe file on your new feature branch <br>
1. Merge this branch with your main branch, resolve the merge conflict and delete the feature branch afterwards.
